description: This file declares internal function prototypes for the Sys Rro Astr Object, which is part of a system module related to Cisco's RDK platform. It contains function declarations for getting and setting record data and values, intended for internal use within the module.

methods.name: SysRroAstrGetRecordData
methods.description: Retrieves the record data into a buffer, providing its size.

methods.name: SysRroAstrSetRecordData
methods.description: Sets the record data from a buffer, specifying its size.

methods.name: SysRroAstrGetRecordValue
methods.description: Retrieves the string value of the record.

methods.name: SysRroAstrSetRecordValue
methods.description: Sets the string value of the record.
